728610f-a.text:
(1)
Bloomingdale Road, west side, between Clay PitAand Sharrotts Road, showing (right) the Rossville African Methodist Episcopal Church and a house adjoining to the south which bears No. 570.
September 23, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view.
September 23, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
728610f-a.folder: Bloomingdale Road & Clay Pit Road, Staten Island, NY
728610f-a.original_title: Richmond: Bloomingdale Road - Clay Pit Road
